entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
